text:
The moment Ningchuan and others boarded the ship, they quickly formed a human wall and blocked Chalmaco Saint.
At the same time, they watched Ningchuan and his group vigilantly, and their hands had quietly touched the weapons on their waists.
As long as Ningchuan and others dared to make any dangerous moves, they would shoot without hesitation!
"Untouchables!"
"How can you untouchables touch the things of the world's nobles?"
"Kneel down and die!"
The roar of the Celestial Dragon Charmaco Saint instantly broke the tranquility on the ship.
His contemptuous word "untouchables" attracted the attention of everyone present.
Some pirates were so weak in the knees by the untouchables.
After all, these were Celestial Dragons, who could not even be looked at directly on weekdays.
When facing their anger, they naturally felt timid.
But a small number of pirates were furious.
They had clearly boarded the Celestial Dragons' ship, and the Celestial Dragons were about to become their spoils.
But even so, the Celestial Dragons dared to put on airs and scold them as untouchables?
And asked them to kneel down and die?
trans:
No momento em que Ningchuan e os outros subiram ao navio, eles rapidamente formaram uma parede humana e bloquearam Chalmaco Saint.
Ao mesmo tempo, observavam Ningchuan e seu grupo com vigilância, e suas mãos haviam tocado discretamente as armas nas suas cinturas.
Assim que Ningchuan e os outros ousassem fazer qualquer movimento perigoso, eles atirariam sem hesitação!
"Intocáveis!"
"Como podem esses intocáveis tocar nas coisas dos nobres do mundo?"
"Ajoelhem-se e morram!"
O rugido do Dragão Celestial Chalmaco Saint quebrou instantaneamente a tranquilidade do navio.
Sua palavra desdenhosa "intocáveis" atraiu a atenção de todos os presentes.
Alguns piratas ficaram tão fracos nas pernas pelos intocáveis.
Afinal, esses eram Dragões Celestiais, que nem podiam ser olhados diretamente no dia a dia.
Ao enfrentarem sua raiva, naturalmente se sentiram intimidados.
Mas um pequeno número de piratas estava furioso.
Eles haviam claramente subido ao navio dos Dragões Celestiais, e os Dragões Celestiais estavam prestes a se tornar seus despojos.
Mas mesmo assim, os Dragões Celestiais ousavam fazer pose e chamá-los de intocáveis?
E os mandavam ajoelhar e morrer?
